question: A small quantity of water is placed in a small cavity made in a block of Ice at 0 degree centigrade. Which of the following will happen?
option1: the temperature of water will become zero and it will freeze
option2: the temperature of water will become zero but it will not freeze
option3: the temperature of the water will become zero and it will come out of the cavity
option4: the temperature of the water will become zero and ice will melt to merge with water
answer: the temperature of water will become zero but it will not freeze
explanation: When a small quantity of water is placed in a small cavity made in a block of Ice at 0 degree centigrade the temperature of water will become zero but it will not freeze.
